settings.description: Configure the way Bloomreach API's are displayed on your Search Results

sortingOptions.label: Sorting Options
sortingOptions.info: You can customize the label and value for each sorting option. Value should be an `fl` field name, followed by asc/desc for ascending/descending order respectively. For example, "sale_price+desc" sorts in descending order of the sale price.

testQuery.label: Search Query for preview
testQuery.info: Enter a search query for previewing the app block in theme editor. This setting does not apply in preview or live site.

useDefault.label: Use default settings
useDefault.info: If checked, the default settings from the App will be used. And all the settings below will be ignored.

additionalParameters.label: Additional Parameters
additionalParameters.info: Any additional parameters you would like to send to the Bloomreach Search API.

reference.info: We've designed the Autosuggest to be highly flexible within Shopify. If you'd like to learn more, or customize what is happening with Autosuggest, check out our documentation. [Learn more](https://documentation.bloomreach.com/)
